abstract: Unilever said the deal would make it the top company in hair conditioning and put it in the top three for shampoo and styling products.
snippet: Unilever said the deal would make it the top company in hair conditioning and put it in the top three for shampoo and styling products.
lead_paragraph: Unilever, the Anglo-Dutch consumer goods company, said Monday that it had agreed to buy the beauty care company Alberto Culver for $3.7 billion.

headline.main: Unilever Makes a $3.7 Billion Deal to Buy Alberto Culver
headline.print_headline: Unilever Makes a $3.7 Billion Deal to Buy Alberto Culver
